CustomField.inlineHelpText: If a Bill To Address is selected, choose whether that should be the sponsor name or the Account should be the sponsor name. (This field is relevant to event sponsorship contracts only.)
CustomField.label: Sponsor Name

value.fullName: List the name of the Account as the sponsor.
value.label: List the name of the Account as the sponsor.

value.fullName: List the name of the Bill To Name and Address as the sponsor.
value.label: List the name of the Bill To Name and Address as the sponsor.
